Quality Refurbished Networking IT HardwareOrangeBall Creative2024-01-22T13:04:38-06:00 
A 360 Approach to Reselling IT Hardware and IT Asset Sustainability
A Dell Technologies Gold PartnerWe are proud to announce our new Dell Technologies Gold Partner status. This higher-level partnership with Dell solidifies our commitment to delivering top-notch technology solutions and opens the door to a world of additional advantages that our customers will benefit from. These include access to comprehensive training programs and tools that elevate our expertise in client and infrastructure solutions. It also allows us to further enhance and streamline support to our customers for a stress-free approach to IT.
Learn More about why this matters
Our DNA: Client-Focused Custom SolutionsA focus on offering our clients custom solutions that meet their unique needs is in our DNA. Taking a brand-agnostic approach, we provide our customers with new hardware, refurbished equipment, and secure and responsible reuse or disposal of equipment, including certified IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) services. With an extensive network built over the last three decades, our goal is to consistently provide our customers with the best solutions and products our industry has to offer.
Maximize your budget with premium IT equipment backed by a partner you can count on.Cisco, Dell, HPE, Networking, Servers, Storage, and more… Summit 360 is an IT solutions provider with a 30-year track record of helping IT Leaders maximize returns on their technology investments. Our hybrid approach blends premium refurbished IT equipment with top-tier OEM partnerships and strategic service capabilities.
We specialize in the entire IT lifecycle: from strategic sourcing to maintenance programs to secure and responsible reuse or disposal of equipment. Our hyper-responsive IT experts are driven by a passion for providing an amazing customer experience.
New and Refurbished Experts
Being in business for 30+ years, we’ve become experts in bringing new and high-quality refurbished networking, server, and storage hardware to the market, including the hard-to-find equipment you need. The only way you’ll know our refurbished hardware is refurbished will be the price.
We Back It Up
From our warranties to the way we support the hardware we provide, we back up everything we sell so that you can trust in its reliability and integrity.
Customer-Centric
Shortened lead times, easy quoting, and live support… Exceeding expectations is often promised, yet rarely delivered. At Summit 360, we deliver responsive service – and we back it up every day.
Leading the circular economy in IT asset disposition.
EXPLOREBUYBACK PROGRAM
Maximize the return on your IT investment. We offer top dollar for excess or obsolete servers, storage, and networking hardware.
EXPLORELIFETIME WARRANTY
Our commitment to you is based on reliability , performance, and the assurance that the refurbished hardware will exceed expectations.
EXPLORE“Summit 360 has been consistent, they have been a great resource in my IT toolbox and the service I get from Summit 360 is always outstanding.”
-Steven

We work closely with top hardware and software vendors.
Summit 360 is proud of our relationships with these industry-leaders, and together, we’re providing high-performing and reliable equipment and software that meets our customer’s IT needs.




Contact us today, and let’s chat about your needs and solutions.
